dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT servprov_gid carrier, REPLACE(insert_user,'SCOULAR/NVODOM.','') insert_user, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(insert_date,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'MM/DD/YYYY') insert_date FROM servprov WHERE domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM' AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(insert_date,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AND insert_user <> 'SCOULAR.INTEGRATION' ORDER BY TO_DATE(insert_date,'rrrr-mm-dd')
